content.question: The graph above refutes which of the following statements?

choices.label: There were more Black people than White people in antebellum South.
Most southern families lived in rural areas.
The southern population was much smaller than that of the North.
Slaveholders were an extremely powerful group.

topic.text: 4.13: The Society of the South in the Early Republic

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
